detail_desc: Hat knitted in organic cotton with an embroidered motif on the front, pompoms on top, earflaps and ties under the chin. Fleece lining.
Shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a zipped back pocket and a flap leg pocket with a zipped compartment.
Small bucket bag in grained imitation leather with a drawstring closure, magnetic fastener at the top and a narrow shoulder strap. Size 12x16x19.5 cm.

Playsuit in sequin-embroidered mesh with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and long, wide sleeves. Opening and button at the back of the neck, a seam at the waist with narrow, covered elastication, and wide legs. Scalloped edges around the neckline, sleeves and hems. Lined.
Swim shorts in woven fabric made from recycled polyester with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Hat in a soft rib knit with an appliqué on the turned-up edge.
Long cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with long sleeves and no buttons.
Swim trousers and top in UV-protective fabric. Top with long raglan sleeves and a small collar. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and lined front. UPF 50.

Short-sleeved shirt in linen with a resort collar, French front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, short slits in the sides and a straight-cut hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Cotton jersey boxer briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Skirt in stretch twill an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, and embroidery on the front. Detachable, braided belt in imitation suede, front pockets and a raw-edge hem.
Long-sleeved dresses in soft organic cotton jersey with a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. One dress is patterned.
Oversized jumper in a soft wool and mohair blend knit with low-dropped shoulders and wide balloon sleeves with narrow cuffs.
Jumper in a soft knit with a lightly brushed finish. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves, wide cuffs with covered buttons, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Fitted cardigan in ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend with a V-neck and eyelet buttoning down the front. Overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Straight-cut jacket in satin crêpe with a collar, jetted front pockets, a slit at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Jersey top with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Hole-patterned trims at the neckline and down the front and back.

All-in-one suit in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front and pockets in the side seams. Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and long legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Pleated trousers in jersey with a slight sheen. High elasticated waist and wide, straight legs with raw-edge hems.
Short, fitted jacket dress in sequined jersey with peak lapels and a wrapover front with a concealed fastening. Unlined.

Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y) with embroidered text inside the waistband, a zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow, cut-off, raw-edge hems.

Short dress in soft Tencel™ lyocell denim with a round neckline, press-stud placket and a yoke with gathers at the shoulders. Long puff sleeves, narrow cuffs with press-studs, a detachable tie belt under the bust and discreet pockets in the side seams. Rounded hem.
Treggings in superstretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake pockets at the front and real pockets at the back.
Sandals in imitation patent leather with crossover straps at the front and a wide elastic heel strap. Imitation leather insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Fitted, turtleneck top in ribbed jersey with long raglan sleeves.

Shaping Brazilian briefs in microfibre with a mesh back section, high waist, lined gusset, wide sides, high-cut legs and half-string back. The briefs have a light shaping effect on the tummy and hips.
Cap with a print motif and appliqué on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Pleated, A-line dress in airy, patterned chiffon with an opening and pearly button at the back of the neck and short butterfly sleeves. Satin lining.
Warm-lined Chelsea boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the front and back. Pile linings and insoles and chunky soles.

Calf-length skirt in woven fabric with pleats at the top for added width. High waist with elasticated smocking at the back, decorative buttons down the front and a concealed zip in one side. Unlined. The polyester content of the skirt is partly recycled.
Dress in an airy, patterned cotton weave with short, wide sleeves, a gathered yoke, buttons at the back and a flared skirt. Unlined.

Lightweight jacket in soft faux shearling with woven details, a double-layered stand-up collar and zip down the front. Dropped shoulders, chest pockets with a concealed zip, and patch front pockets. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Hat in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a ribbed hem.
Cargo trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, flap leg pockets and fake back pockets. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees.
Wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Trousers in an airy viscose weave with a high, elasticated paper bag waist, detachable tie belt, diagonal side pockets and tapered legs.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy patterned weave with a V-neck opening at the front, ties at the top and a pleated trim around the neckline and sleeves. Lined.
Short, straight-cut dress in slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a gentle V-neck and narrow shoulder straps with decorative tie details at the top.
Cotton jersey briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Hipster briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Trainers in cotton canvas with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Cotton linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Wide top in soft, crêped viscose jersey with short cap sleeves and a gently rounded hem.
Long-sleeved tunic in textured-knit jersey with notch lapels and a V-neck with a knot detail at the front.
Classic T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft cotton jersey with a decorative bow at the top, lace trims around the neckline and armholes and press-studs at the crotch.
Short dress in jersey with a V-neck, spaghetti shoulder straps, a seam at the waist and flared skirt. Lined at the top.
Relaxed-fit jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Fitted top in ribbed jersey made from a cotton and modal blend with a rib-trimmed neckline and short puff sleeves with a ribbed trim.
Stretch twill treggings in a cotton blend with an elasticated waist and decorations on the legs.
5-pocket, knee-length skirt in washed cotton denim with lightly worn details. High waist, zip fly and button and a high slit at the front. The skirt is made partly from recycled cotton.
Top in a soft viscose weave with a wide, elasticated neckline, short raglan sleeves with a tie at the sleeve-ends, and an elasticated hem.
Slip-on trainers in fabric with a decorative bow at the front, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Small shoulder bag with a zipped outer compartment, a zip at the top, a narrow shoulder strap and an inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 5.5x14x18.5 cm.
Sleeveless A-line dress woven in a sturdy viscose blend with a concealed zip at the back and seam at the hem with a pleated section below. Lined.
Pool shoes with a glittery, padded foot strap and moulded soles that are fluted underneath (sizes 7-9 with an elastic heel strap).
Shorts in sturdy, textured jersey with an elasticated waist and wrapover sides.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs.
Top in soft, printed jersey. Narrow cut at the top with spaghetti shoulder straps and a racer back.
